p: Madin–Darby canine kidney (MDCK) epithelial cells were grown in Dulbecco’s modified Eagle’s medium (DMEM; Cellgro, Manassas, VA, United States) supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS; Gibco, Carlsbad, CA, United States), 1000 units/mL of penicillin, and 100 μg/mL of streptomycin (Invitrogen, Carlsbad, CA, United States). Infections were performed in Opti-MEM containing 2 μg/mL N-tosyl- L-phenylalanine chloromethyl ketone (TPCK)–trypsin (Sigma–Aldrich, St. Louis, MO, United States). All cells were grown at 37°C in 5% CO 2.
